msbt.message: Heya! You the one that moved in today? , the name was. That you?Just got here myself! Name's .Reckon you and I will be sharin' that new neighbor smell for a bit.Well, you take care of yourself, kiddo. Wander over if you ever get lost, and I'll try to do likewise.

Are you the one that folk've been jabberin' on about? The scamp that just got here, ?I'm . Don't let the cover fool you, kiddo. I'm younger'n I look. Gahaha!Hope I ain't comin' on too strong. Swing on by if you ever wanna chat.

Eh? You that homesteader I keep hearin' about? ?We ain't met. 's the name. Howdy! I'm just now plantin' myself here.Well, come see me once you get your roots in. I'll be around, doin' my old tree thing. Take care!

Hmm? Well, now! Don't think we've met. I'm .And I've been a proud resident of since, lessee couple days now, at least.Well, I'm gonna practice shooin' folk off my lawn. If you ever wanna chat with a grump, swing on by!

COUGH! COUGH! HACK!Ugh So you've come to introduce yourself, eh?Name's . Sorry, not much of an intro, but my trick lung's actin' up on me.Tell you what, let's try this again once I can manage to actually get the words out. Sound good?

Hey there! You live on this here island? Name's . I just got here, myself.Yep, I'm startin' over. They all said I was mad to start over. And they were right, but here I am!Of course, now I gotta deal with a world of boxes. My back wants no part of this startin' over businessYou know what? I'm gonna be at this awhile. Why don't you come visit later, ?

And you are? Oh! You're my neighbor! Ha! Sorry about that. I'm .Now, don't let the creaky exterior fool you. If I like you, I'm actually a nice fella most times.Aaaaanywhatsit, I've got a lot of tidying ahead of me. Let's parlay some other day. .

Hey there! You live around here? I'm new on . The name's .I've been trying to get to know my neighbors, but I think I just keep scaring folks off.Mind you, I like being alone and all, but what if I need to borrow me a cup of pickle brine? What then?Well, I'll let myself get back to being alone, . Stop by if you wanna gab!

You've got the look of a local. Name's . I'm new here.You wouldn't happen to know where I could find some canasta players, would you? No? Didn't think so.Hmm. Well, find me if you ever feel like shooting the breeze. I'll be around.

Oh, it's you! I ain't seen you since, umwait, we ain't met.Sorry about that. The brain box is actin' up again, !Anyway, hi! I'm . Pleased to meet you. Whew, glad we cleared that up. You take care now!

You here to introduce yourself? Ain't that neighborly. My name's . I'm new here.I was going totot-AAAACHOOO! Ugh. Don't think m'bones can take much more of that.As I was gonna be sayin', I'd ask if you wanted to chat, but I don't want you gettin' sick on my account.Come by later and we'll get accustomed, .

Do you live here? You like it? Seems nice, but I only just got here. By the by, I'm .I was looking for a place with a dash of pep to it, and told me this was the place!Well, I got unpacking to do, and a lot of arthritis to push through to do it. Stop by later, alright?

You live around here? 'Course you do! I'm . Pleasure to meet you, !You know ? They said this place was the cat's pajamas, but that ain't my business.Quiet type, eh? Well, I'm around if you ever want someone jawin' at you. Take care!

You We ain't met before, have we? Sorry, my memory's a bit flimsy lately. I'm .Someone named insisted I give a howdy, so here I am!Well, it's no , but I suppose it's growin' on me. Anyhoo, maybe I'll see you around.

Hey! You lost? Oh, you live here! Huh Thought I'd met everyone. The name's . begged me to leave behind. Now I'm getting lost in my own yard!Ah, well. It's good to meet a fellow neighbor. Maybe you can show me around sometime. You take care now!

I don't know you At least, I don't THINK I know you. I'm . You friends with ? It was them that got me thinkin' of moving here totot— AAACHOO!S-sorry about that. Took a chill on the way over. Been quaffing castor oil, but this fever just won't budge.Well, don't want you catchin' cold, so why don't you come by another day?

Oh! A visitor. Fancy that! Hey, so this IS , right? This the right island?It is! Well, that's a relief! Some -er sold me on moving herebut they skedaddled!It takes lot of sand to pull that on . Now if I could just remember their nameAh, well. I'm here now. Oh! I'm , if you didn't catch it. Nice to meet you.

YOU! First you convince me to move here, then you don't even visit? Waitthat wasn't you. Oh.Sorry about that. Some sneak invited me here, then had the gall to move out before I arrived!Folks got no manners, I swear. Oh! Speaking of manners, where're mine? Name's .Well, wherever that rascal's got to, I say 's better off without 'em! Good riddance!

Hmm? You from these parts? The name's . I'm a mite new here, .Let me tell you, it's been rough going. First the scamp that invited me here goes vamoose, and then<10_10 />WAAAAACHOOOOOO!<10_9 />Ughand then I fall sick, to boot! Let's get to know each other once I've cobbled myself together, OK?

You live around here? I don't know you My name's , circlin' back from .I swear, if I knew I'd be back, I woulda just left the dang boxes My back's in open rebellion right now.Well, come by when I've unpacked. I like to get to know my neighbors. Gotta know who I can trust.

Now, it could just be these eyes playin' tricksbut I'm pretty sure I don't know you. You a local?Name's . I just moved back here after living on for a spell.Maybe you can show this around sometime. Honestly, all the changes here kinda frighten me

Is that a new face I see? You'll have to speak up, my vision's not what it used to be, .My name's and ahhahh I've been sneezing up a st—AAAAACHOOOO! Storm. Ugh.Confound it all! I move back from and take ill as soon as I get here.I'm just gonna take it easy for a day or so. Why don't you come by when I'm feeling better?

Hey, you! How are you doing? The name's . I got a real important question for you.Have you ever woken up on a strange island in a house full of boxes with all your things in 'em? No? Just me? I thought this was some kinda practical joke, but this sure as seaweed ain't Ah well, guess I did it again! How do you do, neighbor? Fine day, ain't it?

We ain't met, right? I'm , just in from .Sortin' all these new faces is hard. Every time one stops by, I gotta toss another childhood memory!Well, come by my place if you ever wanna gab. Justdon't ask me to ride a bike or write cursive, alright?

Hey! Arewe neighbors? Name's . At least, that's what my mortgage bill says! I also got an old bill that says I come from , so I suppose that's true too. Anyhoo, I'm lookin' forward to attempting to get to know you! Take care now!

Now that's the confident look of a local if I ever saw one. You ain't lost or confused or nothin'!Howdy! I'm , fresh off the paddle steamer from .Well, it's a pleasure, but don't let me keep you. Come by if you wanna yak, or chitchat, or even prattle on!

We ain't spoken before, right? Pleased totot— <10_10 />AAAACHOOO!<10_9 />Sorry 'bout that. My humors have felt a mite off-kilter since I left . Must be the air.They call me uh, but don't ask me who "they" are. I can't remember.You know what, stop by again after I regain control of my faculties. We'll have us a chinwag.

Do you live here? You like it? Seems nice, but I only just got here. By the by, I'm .I ran into while out on a day trip, you see.I was telling 'em I was after a place with a dash of pep to it, and got pointed here, !Well, I got unpacking to do, and a lot of arthritis to push through to do it. Stop by later, alright?

You live around here? 'Course you do! I'm . Pleasure to meet you, !You know ? They said this place was the cat's pajamas, but that ain't my business.Anyhoo, I ran into 'em while I was out on a little sojourn, . Got myself invited here soon after.Quiet type, eh? Well, I'm around if you ever want someone jawin' at you. Take care!

You We ain't met before, have we? Sorry, my memory's a bit flimsy lately. I'm .I ran into some eager scamp name of when I was out day-tripping, .As soon as we started jawin', it was insisted I give a howdy, so here I am!I wasn't so sure at first, but I must say this place is startin' to grow on me. Maybe I'll see you around.

Hey! You lost? Oh, you live here! Huh Thought I'd met everyone. The name's .I met when we were out on a little trip. They were beggin' me to move here.So now here I am, gettin' lost in my own front yard, Ah well. It's good to meet a fellow neighbor. Maybe you can show me around sometime. Take care now!

I don't know you At least, I don't THINK I know you. Hi. I'm .You friends with ? I met 'em on a day trip a while back, .In fact, it was them that got me thinkin' of moving here totot— AAAAAACHOOOOO!S-sorry about that. Took a chill on the way over. Been quaffing castor oil, but this fever just won't budge.Well, don't want you catchin' cold, so why don't you come by another day?

Oh! A visitor. Fancy that! Hey, so this IS , right? This the right place?It is! Well, that's a relief!I was enjoyin' a day trip when some -er invited me to move herebut they skedaddled!It takes lot of sand to pull that on . Now if I could just remember their nameAh well. I'm here now. And I'm , if you didn't catch it. Nice to meet you.

YOU! First you convince me to move here, then you don't even visit? Waitthat wasn't you. Oh.Sorry about that. Some sneak invited me to move here when we were talkin' on a day trip.Then they had the GALL to move out before I arrived, !Folks got no manners, I swear. Oh! Speaking of manners, where're mine? Name's .Well, wherever that rascal's got to, I say 's better off without 'em! Good riddance!

Hmm? You from these parts? The name's . I'm a mite new here, .Let me tell you, it's been a rough go. I met this fella on a day trip who convinced me to move out here.But then the sour scoundrel goes vamoose before I get here! Moved away! And THEN there'sthere's<10_10 />WAAAAACHOOOOOO!<10_9 />Ughthere's me fallin' sick, to boot. Let's get to know each other once I've cobbled myself together, OK?

Do you live here? You like it? Seems nice, but I only just got here. By the by, I'm .I ran into while at the campsite, you see.I was telling 'em I was after a place with a dash of pep to it, and got invited to move here, !Well, I got unpacking to do, and a lot of arthritis to push through to do it. Stop by later, alright?

You live around here? 'Course you do! I'm . Pleasure to meet you, !You know ? They said this place was the cat's pajamas, but that ain't my business.Anyhoo, I ran into 'em while I was stayin' at the campsite. Got myself invited here soon after.Quiet type, eh? Well, I'm around if you ever want someone jawin' at you. Take care!

You We ain't met before, have we? Sorry, my memory's a bit flimsy lately. I'm .I ran into some eager scamp name of over at the campsite, . As soon as we started jawin', it was insisted I give a longer try, so here I am!I wasn't so sure at first, but I must say this place is really growin' on me. Maybe I'll see you around.

Hey! You lost? Oh, you live here! Huh Thought I'd met everyone. The name's .I met over at the campsite. They were beggin' me to move here.So now here I am, gettin' lost in my own front yard, Ah well. It's good to meet a new neighbor. You take care now!

I don't know you At least, I don't THINK I know you. Hi. I'm .You friends with ? I met 'em at the campsite a while back, .In fact, it was them that got me thinkin' of moving here totot— AAAAAACHOOOOO!S-sorry about that. Took a chill on the way over. Been quaffing castor oil, but this fever just won't budge.Well, don't want you catchin' cold, so why don't you come by another day?

Oh! A visitor. Fancy that! Hey, so this IS , right? This the right place?It is! Well, that's a relief!I was enjoyin' the campsite when some local invited me to move herebut they skedaddled!It takes lot of sand to pull that on . Now if I could just remember their nameAh well. I'm here now. And I'm , if you didn't catch it. Nice to meet you.

YOU! First you convince me to move here, then you don't even visit? Waitthat wasn't you. My bad.Thing is I met someone from this island while I was at the campsite, and they talked me into movin' in. Then they had the GALL to move out before I arrived, !Folks got no manners, I swear. Oh! Speaking of manners, where're mine? Name's .Well, wherever that rascal's got to, I say 's better off without 'em! Good riddance!

Hmm? You from these parts? The name's . I'm a mite new here, .Let me tell you, it's been a rough go. I met this fella at the campsite who convinced me to move out here.But then the sour scoundrel goes vamoose before I get here! Moved away! And THEN there'sthere's<10_10 />WAAAAACHOOOOOO!<10_9 />Ughthere's me fallin' sick, to boot! Let's get to know each other once I've cobbled myself together, OK?

You alright? That there's a powerful look of confoundment you're wearin'. The name's .Let me spin you a yarn I was at the campsite when invited me to come live here.OK, so that ain't much of a yarn. It's barely a strand. Still, hopefully that clears things up a little!Well, take care of yourself. I'll see you around, !

Why, hello there! The name's . How do you do, ?So there I was, enjoyin' a nice, warm mug of pickle brine over at the campsiteWhen comes over, interruptin' my peace and askin' if I wanted to move here!Well, let me tell you, I gave 'em quite a piece of my mind. And that piece was, "Why, sure! I'll pack my things!"Now I'm safe and snug in my new home. 's quite a treat so far!

Pleasure to meet youI think. We ain't met, right? I just moved here and I'm still sortin' everyone out.Oh! The name's , by the by.Anyhoo, I was over at the campsite when invited me to come live here.Well now, how could I turn down such a kindly offer? I booked a blimp on over just as soon as I could.And that's my story. Or what I can remember of it, at any rate.Got plenty more gripping tales where that came from, though, so don't be a stranger, ! Gahaha!

Well now, pleasure to meet you. My name's .You know , right? Good folk. We got to chattin' at the campsite a while back.Guess I made a positive impression. Got myself invited to move here lickety-split, !But I gotta be honest. This is such a nice place that I probably woulda moved here anyway!What I'm gettin' at is that a friend or neighbor of is a friend of mine.And also that I'm sure we'll get to know each other in time. Lookin' forward to it, in fact!

Oh. Howdy. Don't think we've met. Name's .Do you know ? That's who invited me to move in here while I was at the campsite. Was really likin' my new life here on until I got sickMight not wanna get too close, speakin' of. Probably should've mentioned that soonerYou don't wanna catch this bug. Let's talk more once I've managed to get over this, .

You alright? That there's a powerful look of confoundment you're wearin'. The name's .Let me spin you a yarn I was at the campsite when I got myself invited to come live here. And here I am!OK, so that ain't much of a yarn. It's barely a strand. Still, hopefully that clears things up a little!Well, take care of yourself. I'll see you around, !

Why, hello there! The name's . How do you do, ?So there I was, enjoyin' a nice, warm mug of pickle brine over at the campsiteWhen some scamp comes moseyin' over, interrupting my peace and asking if I want to move here!Well, let me tell you, I gave 'em quite a piece of my mind. And that piece was, "Why, sure! I'll pack my things!"Now I'm safe and snug in my new home. 's quite a treat so far!

Heya. Don't believe we've met. Name's .I got myself invited to move in while I was stayin' here at the campsite.Was really enjoyin' my life here on until I got sickMight not wanna get too close, speakin' of. Probably should've mentioned that before nowYou don't wanna catch this bug. Look me up again when I ain't so run-down, OK, ?
